name: Goal Tracker
description: Setting goals and milestones with NotionThis straightforward goal tracker is tailor-made to bring you one step closer to your aspirations. It's the perfect digital buddy to help you set, track, and achieve your goals in various life areas. Watch a video to see the template use in action: Here's what you can do with this template:Create and organize goals in various life areasDefine clear and achievable milestones for each goalTrack goal progress when completing sub-stepsIntegrate small habits in
features: Create and organize goals in various life areas; Define clear and achievable milestones for each goal; Track goal progress when completing sub-steps; Integrate small habits into your daily life; If you haven't got a Notion account yet, make sure tosign upbefore proceeding with duplicating the template.; Additionally, I'd suggest setting up a Gumroad account if you would like to access your purchased templates forever.; Now you're all set to customize your template and set your goals!
